doc.field: - Microtel Inc said it has completed the acquisition of [American Teledata Corp] and its US Dial subsidiary, which provide long distance telephone service in northeast Florida. Terms were not disclosed. Microtel's shareholders include Norfolk Southern Corp [NSC], M/A-Com Inc [MAI], Centel Corp [CNT], Alltel Corp [AT] and E.F. Hutton Group Inc [EFH].
